[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-telemetry/src/utils.rs] [Function: sum_all_histogram_counts()] [Concurrent Modification] If metric_families is being modified by another thread during iteration, can this cause data races or incorrect count calculations? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-telemetry/src/utils.rs] [Function: sum_all_histogram_sums()] [Float Accumulation Precision] When summing many histogram sample_sum values, can accumulated floating-point errors cause significant inaccuracies in total sum calculations? (Low)
